scripts.synth: env=$npm_config_env_name && export NODE_ENV=$env && envFile=.devcontainer/secret.$env.env && test -f "$envFile" && export $(grep -v '^#' "$envFile" | xargs -d '\n'); cdk synth
scripts.deploy:test: npm run deploy DerploidtestLinkDnssec DerploidtestClickDnssec DerploidtestGithubPagesOrganizationWebsite DerploidtestWebsiteRedirect
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run deploy DerploidComDnssec DerploidNetDnssec DerploidOrgDnssec DerploidGithubPagesOrganizationWebsite DerploidWebsiteRedirect DerploidComSendinblueDomainAuthorization
